Suggested_Setup: An NPC heals wounds/cures diseases for free or cheap.
A safe, comfortable place to rest that restores extra health/morale.
Praying here grants a buff (bless, luck, defense) for 24 hours.
Wind/weather shifts to speed up travel or improve visibility.
Players find a path that shaves hours/days off the journey.
Players find abundant food (hunting/foraging) that boosts morale.
An NPC teaches a tip that gives XP or a temporary skill boost.
A well-stocked trader with rare items and fair prices.
Hearing a song/story inspires the party (removes fear/stress).
Friendly animals alert the party to danger or lead them to water.
An itinerant smith sharpens weapons/fixes armor for a meal.
A moment of insight reveals the location of a quest objective.
Friendly soldiers pass by, offering protection for a short time.
A sign (rainbow, shooting star) grants a meta-currency (Inspiration/Luck).
Relaxing water removes exhaustion and stiffness.
A meteor lands nearby containing a small amount of rare crafting material.
A sturdy, waterproof cabin with dry wood ready for a fire.
A player dreams of the solution to a current problem.
A dog/construct follows the party for a day, helping in fights.
A major curse or injury is miraculously cured instantly.
